title: Dead Drop: Rise of the Elites
description: Surviving the Apocalypse wonâ€™t be easy.After a wave of terrorist attacks, conspiracy blogger and urban survival expert, Cooper Reid, drives over two thousand miles to bring his daughter back home to Tucson, Arizona. Rumors of a deadly pandemic and martial law become reality as the Reids make their way home.A secret organization equipped with extraordinary resources and an inconceivable agenda has unleashed events of apocalyptic proportions across the globe. Cooper may know too much about their plans, and they want him dead. And they're not the only ones.The pandemic has spawned a legion of infected. No one is safe.Cooper's survival skills are not enough to keep him and daughter alive. He enlists help from a hipster with a questionable past, an AWOL marine, a small town deputy, and a medical researcher infected with the deadly virus. Together, they might have a chance.
author: K.S. Black
